Waiting for "Dinner For Schmucks"

Normally, FXG_team is perfect and I always trust them for great quality. However, there was something wrong with this movie! It froze not even a third of the way in and then when I got it to play through that part, it froze later on again.. I couldn't get past the first third of the movie.

Everyone else has good comments so maybe there's just something wrong with my media device.

I dont even bother reading comments for FXG anymore. These UL's are ALLWAYS  spot on.
I am only writing this comment to show my appreciation and to ask FXG to please keep up the excellent work.......  Thank you FXG team.....
